Cédric Beust ♔ wrote:
> On Wed, Mar 12, 2008 at 12:52 AM, Ilja Preuss <it@...> wrote:

>> In my not so humble opinion, a complex method is a serious design smell

> For unit tests, yes.  For integration/functional tests, it's pretty common.

Oh. I thought that Stefan was talking about a complex *production* 
method that he wanted to test, not a complex test method.

Cheers, Ilja
